‘jathyanthara athdakim bahula mewani pudgalayan, swairi ratak kerehi balapawathwathayi kiyana batahira kumantha්ranayak gana janathawata kiyanne keseda?’
ee hinda meka umbaa gaththa ekak wenda baha..
koyi hati wuwa me satane jayaga්rahanaya samariya yuththe apa ge wirodara hamudawan samanga ya.
me chithrapatayata hangim nirupanaya ha ranganaya thadinma bandi thibena bawak penenawa.
mawa marunata passe mage mala kanda ammata pennanna epa kiyala mama awasan illimak kala bawa owunta kiyanna..

kese wuwath rajangana gowi janathawage handata ahumkan denawa wenuwata owunata polisiya lawa paharadi, siragatha karamin gowi janaya mardanaya kirimata aanduwa gath ninditha kriyamarga yalith dadi pilikulen yuthuwa hela dakina api, athadanguwata gath gowi nayakayin athulu gowijanathawa wahama nidahas karana lesath gojanaya mardanaya kirima wahama nawathana lesath gowijanathawage jiwana wruththiyata hanikara kriyamarga waha nawathana lesath janathawage awabodhayen ha kamaththen thorawa mema saka sahitha jala wyapruthiya kriyawata nonagana lesath aanduwata balakaramu.

kiyala iwara karanna ba ban eewa..
mama kamathi me reddata- aya kamathi na mepatata
ee samaharu waradana walata rata jathiya pawala dila aragaththu eewa.

mokada kiyanawa nam eyata sihiya nathi wune wahanayak padawamin sitina awasthawe nisa, aayema wahanayak padawanna giyoth eyata thigasmak wage enna puluwani.
ee sandaha palamuwa awashya wanne abhaya bhumiya goda kirima wahama nathara kirima ha danata godakara anawasarin thana athi idikirim siyalla wahama iwath kirimayi.

bohomayak wadagath lipi damila saha malayalam bhashawalata pariwarthanaya kota eewa apa wenuwen shri lankawe mudranaya kota, ohu china komiyunist pakshaye shastha්riya lipilekhana samanya lesa apata labennata salaswuha.
namuth mema siwil samaja kandayam me siyalu awalada, apahasa wida dara ganimin wareka sharirikawada wandi gewamin thama karyan nonawathi karagena yanu labiya.
danata sanskarana yatathe athi kosowo hi p ristina hi p radhana dewasthanayamagin da aya wetha gaurawayan pirinama atha.

innawa aththe ube kamareta ara kelin thiyena kamare...
oya dannawa ayi akka ehe kale kiyala
oyage aadaraniyan inna thana thappara 5k athulatha lankawe kohe hitiyath balaganna puluwan..
siseriyanhata sisarge penuma saha hasirim wilasaya pawathi bawa kiyawe.
janadhipathiwaranayak thibunoth labena pa්rathipalaya chayarupa deka ingi kara thibuni.kese ho es.bi. sudanam wuye suba nakathin maha amathi lesa diwurum dimataya.
eya ee lesata wigrahakota gathahoth meya nam maha irisiyawakin wasunu warthamanayak nisa aadarayen pirunu athithaya sahamulinma winasa kara damuwak waniya.

minis sitha dharmanukula nathnam sasalawim hamuwe idiriyata ya nohakakolambaa shri sambuddhaloka wiharawasi kolambaa disthrik sahakara adhyapana adhyakshashasthrapathi witharandeniye medhananda himiminisa adhyathmika ha bhauthika yana deyakarayenma paripurna wiya yuthu bawa budu dahame apekshawayi.
buyo wanshaya wisin wisthapanaya kirimata pera pawathi rajakiya gruhaya he wanshaya wuwath, mema wansha dekama buyo saha goguryo pelapathwalin sambhawaya wuwan yayi salake.
obe naya ge lipinaya, durakathana ankaya samaga.
mama katha nathuwa eyawa alla ganna panna.

thaman palath sabhawe mantha්riwarun balans karanne wahana, salli dimen bawa palath maha amathi chamara sampath dasanayaka mahatha wisin kala pa්rakashayakata ema sabhawe mantha්riwarunge dadi wirodaya ella wiya.
awith eeken thaliyak athata aragena thamange puke hila udayi athuleyi gagaththa.
tika welawakin ganita aayith ridme allaganna puluwan wuna.

warshawa ada halenawitama siwdesin tharuna piris duwagenawith aawarana yoda kridanganaya wasa ganithi.warshawa nawathinawath samaga yali kriyathmaka wana me tharunayo yuhusuluwa aawarana iwathkara kridanganaya yali bharadethi.
ehidi purwa lama awadhiye molaෙy wardhanaya gana nawa parikshana karamin, uthpada karya
ee atharema maharagama guru widyale puhunuwatath illum kala.
ithin ara rajjuruwange gem ekata giya gobila karunu karana hoyagena apahu aawa..
mehidi lakunu 15 kata kadulu 3 k binda helu shaminda eranga tharagaye wiraya sammanayen pidum labiya.
boruwa: "aarakshaka amathyanshaye hitapu lekam praharaka yanawal 6 k genahalla 6 ma kadagena watuna."
janadhipathiwarayage upadeshakayan anumana karanne mewani janapa්riya siduwim haraha janadhipathiwarayage pa්rathirupaya ihala damiya haki bawayi.
ee athara mama thaniwa manasin athithayata giyemi.

kese wethath mewani siduwim ekapita eka siduwimen anathuruwa tika kalayak yanathuru polispathiwaraya sambandhayen mewani siduwim wartha wana aakarayak dakagannata labune nathath pasugiya sathiye hiti hatiyema siduwu ekthara wishesha siduwimak mulkara ganimin polispathiwaraya sambandhayen madhyayata puwathak wartha wi thibini.
sapeksha bawin yukthaya.
aakramanaya aashirwadayak karagannata sithu kalmikwaru sowiyat palanayata erehiwa satan kirima sandaha jarman hamudawata bandunaha.
juli kalabala asamanya siddhiyak bawath, eyata hethu wu merata demala bedumwadi tha්rasthawadaya pilibanda katha nokirima waradak bawath ema lipiyen awadharanaya kota thibuna.
ohu nari ha pa්rasawaweda wisheshagnya waidyawarayeki.

oonama pudgalayekuta puluwan thamange kalayen winadi 15 – 30th athara kala simawak awidime wyayamaya wenuwen wen karanna.
ohuta ee kanagatuwa thiyena thak ohuta samawa labenawa.

thawath ewani wargaye sathek wana chathura rajapaksha (pera alwis) udasana puwath path kiyawimata muwa wemin rata thula sinhala bauddha warga wadaya awilawimata uthsaha karana wita emagin agathiyata path wana sulu jathikayange aarakshawa wenuwen peni sitinne kawuda ?

oonama kamkaruwek samagamata hari eeke depolawalata hari haniyak karanna yanawa kiyala kalamanakaranayata hangunoth, ee kamkaruwawa ayin karanna puluwan kiyana samagame niyogayak eegollo uputala pennuwa.
[me kawiya thawama nirmana pala kirimata tharam thakshanika parichayak nathi kenekugen kopi kala ekaki]
ohu pawasanne naya mudalak gewa damimata wanija nayak nogatha yuthu bawayi.
maithri ehi yanawita ehi balaporoththu nowu amuththek ohu idiriyata paminiyeya.
me wana wita samajaye thriwilar ratha, kuda lori ratha, kar wan ratha yodagena prawahana sewa sapayana boho pirisak wethi.
